org.xchain.framework.javascript

Class JsCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xchain.framework.javascript.JsCompressor

  • public class JsCompressor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is essentially a reimplementation of org.dojotoolkit.shrinksafe.Main for using org.dojotoolkit.shrinksafe.Compressor.
    Author:
    John Trimble, Josh Kennedy

    • Constructor Summary

      JsCompressor(int optimizationLevel) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compress(java.net.URL[] javaScriptUrls, java.io.OutputStream output)
      Reads each URL in javaScriptUrls, in order, compresses the data and streams the result to the output stream.

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public void compress(java.net.URL[] javaScriptUrls,
            java.io.OutputStream output)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads each URL in javaScriptUrls, in order, compresses the data and streams the result to the output stream. Does not close output.
        Parameters:
        javaScriptUrls - - An array of URLs pointing to valid Java Script content.
        output - - The stream to which the compressed content is written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
